items.title: Stock Market Today: Sebi Board meet, Manba Fin IPO listing, Nikkei sinks 4%
items.description: At 6:32 AM, GIFT Nifty futures were trading about 38 points lower at 26,307 levels, indicating a negative opening compared to the last close of Nifty futures.

items.title: KRN Heat Exchanger IPO allotment: Check status, GMP, likely listing price
items.description: Once the allotment of KRN Heat Exchanger IPO is finalised, investors can check their status by visiting the official websites of BSE, NSE, or Bigshare Services
